Have the council even discussed the Vok Destroyer yet?

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
>   Alright. We all know the rpg seems to bog down
> these days. Rauq, 
> Rudra and I will do something about it, and changes,
> hopefully for the 
> better, will come sooner or later. 
>   However, the council may be an important part of
> the rpg, but they 
> are merely players amongst others. For this reason,
> it is important 
> for everyone to reply to the posts concerning their
> characters AS 
> OFTEN AS POSSIBLE. I do not ask ten posts daily, but
> maybe posting 
> every two days would be a good start. With the end
> of the school year, 
> I know everyone will not always be posting ready. I
> can understand 
> that.
>   Also, LN gave me and Rauq a lot to think about.
> His arguments had a 
> lot of interest, in my opinion, and they could serve
> for ameliorating 
> the game. If you have suggestions that you feel
> could help us in that 
> sense, please, do like LN (well, except dropping all
> chars, lol!) and 
> give us feedbacks about the way you feel in this
> rpg. This council, 
> after all, is here for the players and as players as
> well. If everyone 
> gets really into it, we can and we will make this a
> lot better.
>   Rudra, Rauq, tell me if I screwed up. BTW, Rudra,
> I'll send some 
> stuff to you so you can get back in the train.
> 
>
